GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns all details for an article with the supplied id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: posts to the comment table with reference to the provided article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the article entry with the corresponding article_id, currently updates votes
